presentationColumns.name: Total Expense Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the Expense Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Total Expense Amount

presentationColumns.name: Credit Card Expense Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the Expense Amount for lines with Expense source as Credit card.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Credit Card Expense Amount

presentationColumns.name: Cash Expense Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the Expense Amount for lines with Expense source as Cash.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Cash Expense Amount

presentationColumns.name: Average Expense Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Total Expense Amount/Expense Reports Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Average Expense Amount
